title: Stocks, Bonds & Taxes: A Comprehensive Handbook and Investment Guide for Everybody
description: NO SERIOUS INVESTOR SHOULD CONSIDER BUYING, SELLING, OR INVESTING BEFORE READING THIS BOOK! Investing How to deal and make money in a declining Stock Market!Find out how professionals and wealthy people trade and invest!Read the pros and cons of every kind of investment strategy!Find out when the IRS makes personal house calls on investors!Investor knowledge is power, this book gives it all to you!How to increase your yield on most investments!Life planningAll about living trusts.Probate and estate rules and laws. CybercurrencyHow to handle IRS audits.Tax court & the hazards of litigation.How to handle bankruptcy, bad debt, and credit scores.Phillip Bruce Chute, EA has been Enrolled to Practice before the Internal Revenue Service since 1976. He was a Registered Investment Advisor and Registered Securities Principal for 20 years.
author: Phillip B. Chute
